a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Stratospheric ozone concentrations with projections to 2100 based on chemistry-climate models. These are
measured as global and regional averages relative to levels in 1960 (1960 = 0).
Note: Figures represent the mean across a number of model runs; model projections have notable uncertainty around such average
